verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, when <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto him, after he had gone <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%>. Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me, O <S%H430>God<s%>, according to thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>: according unto the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> blot <S%H4229>out<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>.
<S%H3526>Wash<s%> me <S%H7235>throughly<s%> from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: and my <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H8548>ever<s%> before me.

Against thee, thee only, have I <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>: that thou mightest be <S%H6663>justified<s%> when thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%>, and be <S%H2135>clear<s%> when thou <S%H8199>judgest<s%>.
Behold, I was <S%H2342>shapen<s%> in <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; and in <S%H2399>sin<s%> did my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3179>conceive<s%> me. conceive: Heb. warm me
Behold, thou <S%H2654>desirest<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts<s%>: and in the <S%H5640>hidden<s%> part thou shalt make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
<S%H2398>Purge<s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and I shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: <S%H3526>wash<s%> me, and I shall be <S%H3835>whiter<s%> than <S%H7950>snow<s%>.
Make me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>; that the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which thou hast <S%H1794>broken<s%> may <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>.
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H2399>sins<s%>, and blot <S%H4229>out<s%> all mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
<S%H1254>Create<s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; and <S%H2318>renew<s%> a <S%H3559>right<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me. right: or, constant
Cast me not <S%H7993>away<s%> from thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>; and <S%H3947>take<s%> not thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from me.
<S%H7725>Restore<s%> unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; and <S%H5564>uphold<s%> me with thy <S%H5081>free<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Then will I <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>; and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be <S%H7725>converted<s%> unto thee.

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>. bloodguiltiness: Heb. bloods
O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H6605>open<s%> thou my <S%H8193>lips<s%>; and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall shew <S%H5046>forth<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
For thou <S%H2654>desirest<s%> not <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; else would I <S%H5414>give<s%> it: thou <S%H7521>delightest<s%> not in burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>. else: or, that I should

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: a <S%H7665>broken<s%> and a <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou wilt not <S%H959>despise<s%>.
Do <S%H3190>good<s%> in thy good <S%H7522>pleasure<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H1129>build<s%> thou the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then shalt thou be <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, with burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H3632>whole<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>: then shall they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> upon thine <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
